scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of 12 postcards and brief letters to Lucien and Francesca Carr.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien Carr 1960 February 16

scopecontent.p: Describes Valdivia, Chile, and experiences there with Peter Orlovsky at the university, and future travel plans in South America.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1961 May 27

scopecontent.p: Describes experiences in Cannes, the film crew working on The Connection,St. Tropez, plans for travel to Marseilles and Tangier to see William Burroughs.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien Carr 1961 July 28

scopecontent.p: Discusses invasion of Cuba, William Burroughs, The Soft Machine,travel in France and Morocco, plans for travel in Israel and India, Jack Kerouac.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1962 May 16

scopecontent.p: Describes experiences in India, temples, poets, actors, Tibetan tankas, music. Mentions Epics, Myths and Legends of Indiaby Paul Thomas.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1962 July 28

scopecontent.p: Describes Tibetan pictures being sent for safekeeping, travels in India, monasteries, life in Calcutta, Bengali poets, mutual friends including Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1962 October 6

scopecontent.p: Describes Durga puja, a religious holiday being celebrated in Calcutta, and other rituals. Discusses publication of Reality Sandwiches,correspondence with Bertrand Russell concerning fears of nuclear holocaust, future travel plans, and Bengali poets.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1962 November 3

scopecontent.p: Discusses controversial poem, Bertrand Russell's fear of nuclear danger and other current political matters, visit to a monastery in Bengal, plans to attend religious and musical festivals and more travel.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Francesca Carr 1962 November 16

scopecontent.p: Inquires about Tibetan paintings, describes experiences in Calcutta, and Indian music.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr [1963 January 15?]

scopecontent.p: Describes surroundings and experiences in Benares, India, and the Taj Mahal, writing projects, current state of the Cold War, and India's war with China.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1963 August 19

scopecontent.p: Briefly describes activities in Vancouver while teaching students and sense of satisfaction about India experience.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr 1963 November 22

scopecontent.p: Describes plan to return to Paterson, N.J., for family visit, and current state of mind.

did.unittitle: Allen Ginsberg to Lucien and Francesca Carr [n.y.] October 6

scopecontent.p: Discusses plans to visit Israel and India, requests William Burroughs' address and news of Harvard.
